attributes.action: Make it compulsory for children to be vaccinated to attend school
attributes.additional_details: With the rise of anti vaxxers children are at risk of diseases that can be prevented. Many countries or states are introducing this and the UK should follow
attributes.background: The UK should follow other countries and make it mandatory for children to be vaccinated if they are going to a government funded school (unless a medical certificate is issued to say there is a medical reason that they can’t be vaccinated)
